title: League failed to update?
body:
so i am trying to update my lol client but it gets to 32% and comes up with a notice sail error : failed to update.

i have uninstalled and re-installed the client but it gets to the same percentage and stops.

is this a global issue on oce or is there just something wrong with my client in particular??

replies.body:
I'm currently getting this issue, as I have been ever since they updated the patcher.

I've yet found out what's causing it, but usually uninstalling League entirely, resetting computer, and then reinstalling, fixes it.

Try changing the default directory?
